name: Hackade
description:
You are a bog-standard, scranny hacker who was looking to make a quick buck by rigging some cabinets at your local arcade when things go awry. One of the old circuits sparked your multitool and now, you're in the thick of it.

Armed with naught but your wits and your amorphous multitool, you need to find a way to not only escape the games you're trapped in but survive them as well.

By helping the players or the game win, you hope to make your bid for freedom.

Made for the LM0B #28 game jam. Theme: Arcade.
